source: Reward for inviting Yoimiya to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is $[A1305], equip this card.
After $[A1305] equips this card, immediately use $[S13052] once.
After your $[A1305], who has this card equipped, triggers Niwabi Enshou: Deal 1 additional Pyro DMG.
(You must have $[A1305] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
